item.name: POST | Payment Method
Payment Domain [TC-13]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with the valid data set .
Payment Domain [TC-14]- Verify an API behaviour to POST another  payment method with the valid data set .
Payment Domain [TC-15]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with the valid data set in the mandatory fields .
Payment Domain [TC-16]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with the valid data set but no wallet ID.
Payment Domain [TC-17]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the same  payment method with the valid data set .
Payment Domain [TC-18]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with no data in the mandatory fields
Payment Domain [TC-19]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no card type.
Payment Domain [TC-20]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no payment method type.
Payment Domain [TC-21]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no card holder name.
Payment Domain [TC-22]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no 6 digit card.
Payment Domain [TC-23]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no 4 digit card.
Payment Domain [TC-24]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no expiry month.
Payment Domain [TC-25]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no expiry year.
Payment Domain [TC-26]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no token type.
Payment Domain [TC-27]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no paymnet Provider.
Payment Domain [TC-28]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no address ID.
Payment Domain [TC-29]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but no address version.
Payment Domain [TC-30]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but 'is saved ' flag is false.
Payment Domain [TC-31]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but 'is saved ' flag is true.
Payment Domain [TC-32]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but 'is deleted' flag is true.
Payment Domain [TC-32]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but 'is deleted' flag is false.
Payment Domain [TC-33]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but "is_shared_across_tenants"' flag is true
Payment Domain [TC-34]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but "is_shared_across_tenants"' flag is false.
Payment Domain [TC-35]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but "is_default_payment_method"' flag is false.
Payment Domain [TC-36]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with valid Wallet ID and valid data set but "is_default_payment_method"' flag is true.
Payment Domain [TC-37]- Verify an API behaviour to POST the  payment method with the valid data set  but with expired year
GET|Payment Method
Payment Domain [TC-01]- Verify an API behaviour to GET all  payment method with the valid data set.
Payment Domain [TC-02]- Verify an API behaviour to GET all  payment method with the invalid Wallet ID.
Payment Domain [TC-03]- Verify an API behaviour to GET all  payment method with the valid Wallet ID but Device type missing.
GET |PaymentMethodID
Payment Domain [TC-05]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with the valid payment method ID .
Payment Domain [TC-06]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with the valid payment method ID but wrong params.
Payment Domain [TC-07]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with the Invalid payment method ID .
Payment Domain [TC-08]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with the NO  payment method ID .
Payment Domain [TC-08]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with the expired year payment method method id.
Payment Domain [TC-08]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with the the flag "is saved" as false.
Get | Payment Method RedactedByID
Payment Domain [TC-01]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with Redacted response with the valid payment method ID .
Payment Domain [TC-02]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with Redacted response with the valid payment method ID but wrong params.
Payment Domain [TC-03]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with Redacted response with the Invalid payment method ID .
Payment Domain [TC-04]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with Redacted response with the NO  payment method ID .
Payment Domain [TC-05]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with Redacted response with the expired year payment method method id. Copy
Payment Domain [TC-06]- Verify an API behaviour to GET the  payment method with Redacted response with the the flag "is saved" as false.
DELETE | Payment Method
Payment Domain [TC-09]- Verify an API behaviour to DELETE the  payment method with the valid payment method ID and valid Wallet ID.
Payment Domain [TC-10]- Verify an API behaviour to DELETE the  payment method with the Invalid payment method ID and Valid Wallet ID .
Payment Domain [TC-11]- Verify an API behaviour to DELETE the  payment method with the valid payment method ID but Invalid Wallet ID.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("No Wallet is available for the input");

item.name: Payment Domain [TC-12]- Verify an API behaviour to DELETE the  payment method with the Invalid payment method ID and Invalid Wallet ID.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("No Wallet is available for the input");
